Articles.Content:
First time here, so if I missed something let me know.

I didn't find anything in the 'Don't ask' list, nor in the planned features list, about this.

I'd like to be able to disable the audio somehow without having to back out to the main window, going into settings, and disabling music. When minimized seems like the simplest solution.

Why? I like the music when I'm playing, but not when I'm distracted/on a phone call/etc, and don't necessarily want to shut the game down, either.

Thanks in advance.

Hit the escape key while in-flight, and you can adjust the types of sounds under the settings option there on that escape menu. Okay, that's kind of clunky too, but it is easier than exiting to the main menus.
